WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
1. DERELICT S/V TWIN STAR ADRIFT IN
   40-33.0N 006-14.4E AT 082035Z JUL. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   AND REPORT ANY SIGHTINGS TO TO MRCC LA GARDE,
   TELEX: 430024, PHONE: 334 9461 1616,
   FAX: 334 9427 1149, E-MAIL: LAGARDE@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 112305Z JUL 18.
